alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 2:33PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Grant, southeastern Saline, east central Hot Spring and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 300 PM CST... At 233 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poyen, or 10 miles east of Malvern, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Traskwood... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Otter Creek... Cane Creek... Ironton... Estes... East End... Orion... Sweet Home... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 126 and 141. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
